page.title: 17 Toys and Games
page.content: Some of the toy figures we enjoy playing with are Action Man,Care Bear, He Man and Star Wars characters.Dolls such as Sindy, Barbie and My Little Pony are designed mainly for girls. Games we enjoy playing in our leisure time are Creeping Jenny,Hot Chocolate, Hop scotch,Rounders,Cricket,Hockey, Volleyball,tennis and British Bulldog. {British Bulldog.}When"British Bulldog" is called children run from one side of the playground to the other.If the catcher touches some- one and calls "British Bulldog 1,2,3" they become a catcher as well. {Hot Chocolate (Creeping Jenny).}A person stands with their back to the players,then suddenly turns round.Any- one caught moving stands with their arms out-stretched waiting to be touched by other players.When touched the person who's it chases players.
